page.title: 16THE MAZE RACECOURSE
page.content: {The Maze Racecourse}is also known as { {The Down Royal }and is Northern Irelands Premier course.There are three large stands,eighty four stables,bars,offices,changing rooms and betting areas.The course itself is two miles long with ten steeple and eight hurdle jumps. On the nineteenth of December this race course will be three hundred years old.There are about fourteen meetings each year.The largest meetings are during the summer months. At one of these meetings a crowd of between three and four thousand would be expected.Improvements to the course such as levelling and widening go on all year as does improving of facilities i.e.bars,cafes,etc. Admission to the course is three pounds fifty for adults and children get in for nothing.
